snippet: Government agencies, travel-related companies, hotels and other groups are trying to train people to identify and report potential trafficking incidents.
abstract: Travel industry, long an unwitting participant in human trafficking at hotels and on airplanes, trains and buses, has been increasing efforts to combat the problem, working with private advocacy groups and the federal government in long-term, coordinated initiatives that go beyond normal philanthropic activities.
lead_paragraph: Government agencies, travel-related companies, hotels and other groups are trying to train people to identify and report potential trafficking incidents.

headline.seo: The Travel Industry Takes On Human Trafficking
headline.main: The Travel Industry Takes On Human Trafficking
headline.print_headline: The Travel Industry Takes On Human Trafficking
